item.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Says Brad Falchuk Is a 'Grinch' During Holidays, Jokes 'I Feel Very Alone' in 'My Love for Christmas'

item.title: Lily Allen Says She Has a 'Better Idea' of the 'Pain' She May Have Caused in Her First Marriage After David Harbour Split
item.description: "I've learned how horrible it is to be on the receiving end of that," Allen said in an 'Observer UK' interview on Saturday, Dec. 20
